item.title: Do you brag about learning a foreign language? Blog about it instead!
item.description: So, do you brag about learning a foreign language? Let’s admit: most of us do, in one form or another. Don’t you update your social media profiles, your CV, or suddenly greet a colleague in a coffee kitchen in his native tongue, which you incidently happen to learn? Learning a foreign language requires an effort. Diminished capability to express yourself can also be frustrating at times. And so we seek additional motivation and approval from people around us, and so we brag, in one form or another.
